    #include <bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    typedef long long int ll;
    const int mod = 1e9+7;
    ll power(ll x,ll y)
    {
        ll temp;
        if( y == 0)
            return 1;
        temp = power(x, y/2);
        if (y%2 == 0)
            return (temp%mod * temp%mod)%mod;
        else
            return (x%mod * temp%mod * temp%mod)%mod;
    }
     
    int main() {
    	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    	cin.tie(0);
    	cout.tie(0);
    	int t;
    	cin>>t;
    	while(t--)
    	{
    		ll k,s;
    		cin>>k>>s;
    		if(s%k==0)
    			cout<<(power(s/k,k)%mod)<<"\n";
    		else
    		{
    			ll rem=s%k;
    			ll qu=s/k;
    			//cout<<rem<<" "<<qu<<"\n";
    			cout<<(power(qu+1,rem)%mod * power(qu,k-rem)%mod)<<"\n";
    		}
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
